Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_1
Text.DisplayName: Taiyi's Intro to Formations
Text.Desc: Uma introdução aos estudos de Formações projetadas para iniciantes da Seita Taiyi. Ele registra o protótipo de pilares e auxiliares comuns, o que é ótimo para os novos alunos praticarem a evolução e os derivados da implantação da Formação. \nO Círculo Protótipo é a base de todas as Formações, portanto, pode ser unido a quaisquer outros Círculos avançados. Embora não haja efeitos de bônus para aqueles conectados através de Proto-auxiliares, ele pode pelo menos garantir que o Círculo esteja completo e operacional.
Text.EffectDesc:
Aumenta ligeiramente a carga máxima de formação.
Unlocks Pillar: 
Proto-pillar: Interval
Proto-pillar: Cord
Proto-pillar: Vacant
Proto-pillar: Whole

Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Proto-auxiliary: Bond
Proto-auxiliary: Pair
Proto-auxiliary: Partition
Proto-auxiliary: Union
Proto-auxiliary: Severance
Proto-auxiliary: Cross
Proto-auxiliary: Scatter
Proto-auxiliary: Critical

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_2
Text.DisplayName: Taiyi's Formation Diagrams of Four Guiders
Text.Desc: Um manual secreto sobre Formações da Seita Taiyi, no qual o pilar e os auxiliares são todos retirados de exemplos amplamente difundidos no mundo do cultivo. A ideia central dessas técnicas de implantação do Círculo é focar no equilíbrio, tudo de grande adaptabilidade.
Text.EffectDesc:
Aumenta ligeiramente a carga máxima de formação.
Unlocks Pillar: 
Hidden Blade of Positivity
Hidden Curse of Verification
Concentrated Sword Aura
Hidden Seal of Creed
True Congealed Positivity
Supreme Transformed Pliability
Balance of the Realms

Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Sword
Creed
Justice
Pliability
Relativity
Reaction
Justice Sword
Pliable Sword
Positive Creed
Pliable Creed
Hidden Blade
Hidden Curse

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_3
Text.DisplayName: Diagrams of the Spiritual Beasts
Text.Desc: Manual secreto de Diagramas de Formação transmitidos desde os tempos antigos que se inspiraram nas formas espirituais das bestas. Muito milagroso e original.
Text.EffectDesc:
Aumenta ligeiramente a carga máxima de formação.
Unlocks Pillar: 
Armored Scorpion Tail
Scaled Snake Breath
Sworded Turtle Tail
Cursed Turtle Form
Petrified Turtle Shell
Cry of the Crane
Thundercloud Dragon
Soaring Flood Dragon

Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Sword
Creed
Justice
Pliability
Scorpion Tail
Snake Breath
Alligator Maw
Dragon Song
Turtle Form
Crane Sword
Mirage

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_4
Text.DisplayName: Polarized Diagrams of Mt. Zhongyuan
Text.Desc: De Mt. Zhongyuan, uma seita famosa que se destacou em Formações na época medieval. A idéia de Mt. Zhongyuan em relação ao cultivo é alcançar extremidades. As formações provenientes desta seita também realizam a ideia, mantendo o princípio até o fim.
Text.EffectDesc:
Aumenta ligeiramente a carga máxima de formação.
Unlocks Pillar: 
Concentrated Sword Aura
Hidden Seal of Creed
True Congealed Positivity
Supreme Transformed Pliability
Cardinal of Swords
Cardinal of Creeds
Cardinal of True Positivity
Cardinal of Profound Pliability

Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Sword
Creed
Justice
Pliability
Sharpened Sword
Concentrated Creed
Doubled Positivity
Combined Pliability
Sword Aura
Creed Seal
True Justice
Profound Pliability

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_5
Text.DisplayName: Secret Revitalizing Diagrams of Heaven and Earth
Text.Desc: Uma maneira de projetar Formações imitando a natureza. Este manual é transmitido desde os tempos antigos, sua origem desconhecida e inverificável. Raramente é herdado no mundo dos cultivadores. Muito misterioso.
Text.EffectDesc:
Aumenta ligeiramente a carga máxima de formação.
Unlocks Pillar: 
Rain of Pine Spikes
Wind of Cursed Pine
Old Hidden Thorn
Deadwood Spirit
Pine-clamped Rock
Blade of Tide
Constant of Storm
Earth-piercing Blade
Sand of Divine Curse

Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Sword
Creed
Justice
Pliability
Pine Spike
Ancient Texture
Rattan Armor

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_6
Text.DisplayName: Primordial Diagrams of Heluo: Syllabus
Text.Desc: Utilize a profundidade dos Oito Trigramas para implantar Formações, como os caminhos primordiais de Heluo de outrora. Está perdido há muito tempo.
Text.EffectDesc:
Increases Max Formation Load.
Unlocks Pillar:

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_15
Text.DisplayName: Primordial Diagrams of Heluo: Solutions of the Demon Emperor
Text.Desc: Uma versão revisada dos Diagramas Primordiais de Heluo compilados por Fu Pikong, o Imperador dos Demônios. Com talentos inigualáveis, ele conseguiu projetar a regra de alteração da formação para os auxiliares, ampliando muito as aplicações gerais das Formações. Era uma obra-prima que conectava aqueles que vinham antes e depois.
Text.EffectDesc:
Significantly increases Formation Load.
Increases Formation Size
Unlocks Auxiliary: 
Centers of Changed Formation of the Twenty-Four Primordial Auxiliaries

Text.DisplayName: Heavenly Diagrams: Way of Sun and Moon

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit1
Text.DisplayName: Ragestriker Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Ragestriker Formation. It is said to be the most ruthless Formation of all on ancient battlefields, being virtually invincible and unstoppable.
Text.EffectDesc:
Significantly increases Formation Load.
Increases Formation Size
Unlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: 
Ragestriker Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Ragestriker Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Since time immemorial, this has been the formation with the greatest offensive power. When deployed, it will turn into four banner gates each with a sword hanging above it, completely surrounding the center. Once activated with primordial spirit, the four swords will vibrate simultaneously, and the Formation is immediately filled with Sword Aura. Even the truest immortal can hardly survive within it.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit2
Text.DisplayName: Conqueror's Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Conqueror's Formation. It is said to be capable of harnessing the Grand Chariot's divine light of Aloofness, which grants it omniscient demon-slaying powers.
Text.EffectDesc:
Significantly increases Formation Load.
Increases Formation Size
Unlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: 
Conqueror's Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Conqueror's Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Formation of immortals said to be passed down from the Evil Exorcising Perfected Warrior of Ninth Heavenly Paradise. It can direct the power of seven stars to form the Grand Chariot's divine light of Aloofness, a demon-slaying power that can obliterate all evils.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit3
Text.DisplayName: Impregnable Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Impregnable Formation. It is said to be capable of deploying a indestructible field with the Five Directional Banners of Heaven and Earth to protect anything in the universe.
Text.EffectDesc:
Significantly increases Formation Load.
Increases Formation Size
Unlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: 
Impregnable Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Impregnable Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: A great formation based on the five Vast Banners which have existed since the beginning of time itself. The northern banner is referred to as Black Vulture, the southern as Soaring Flame, the central banner as Yellow Apricot, the western as White Cloud, and the eastern as Green Lotus. The combination of the Five Elements forms a Shield of Vastness, which cannot be invaded despite the changing of natural laws.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit4
Text.DisplayName: Divine Law Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Divine Law Formation. It is said to be a Formation of divinators of the six gods of Celestial Court, capable of turning the Mortal Realm into a paradise and making people live in spiritual harmony.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nDivine Law Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Divine Law Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Ceremonial formation of law operations on the Celestial Court. When deploying this Formation, it will unfold a pristine abode of the six gods of Celestial Court, turning the Mortal Realm into a paradise and making people live in spiritual harmony.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit5
Text.DisplayName: Dragonrider Formation
Text.Desc: Secret Formation Diagram that records the Dragonrider Formation. It is said to be a dragon controlling Formation. When deployed, one can draw the power of Dragonsoul to perform some powerful Formation miracles.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nDragonrider Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Dragonrider Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: A fascinating Formation that utilizes the body of Flood Dragon as foundation. It is said to be a dragon-controlling formation. When deployed, one can draw the power of Dragonsoul to perform some powerful Formation miracles.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit6
Text.DisplayName: Phoenix Sword Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Phoenix Sword Formation. It is said to be a phoenix-controlling formation. When deployed, one can draw the power of Phoenixsoul to perform some powerful Formation miracles.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nPhoenix Sword Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Phoenix Sword Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: A fascinating Formation that utilizes the body of Phoenoxica as foundation. It is said to be a phoenix-controlling formation. When deployed, one can draw the power of Phoenixsoul to perform some powerful Formation miracles.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit7
Text.DisplayName: Yin Yang Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Yin Yang Formation. It is said that this Formation is deployed according to the Rule of Yin and Yang. Utilizing the transformation of Yin and Yang, the Formation becomes extremely flexible.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nYin Yang Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Yin Yang Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Formation Diagram that drew its inspirations from the flow of energies between heaven and earth. It is said that this Formation is deployed according to the Rule of Yin and Yang. Utilizing the transformation of Yin and Yang, the Formation becomes extremely flexible.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit8
Text.DisplayName: Dark Force Formation
Text.Desc: Secret Formation Diagram that records the Dark Force Formation. It is said to be a Formation formed by pure Yin energy, which can greatly enhance your power.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nDark Force Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Dark Force Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Formation deployed by utilizing the idea of Three Talents - Heaven, Earth and Human. It is said to be capable of concentrating all the pure Yin energies of the world, which can greatly enhance your power.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit9
Text.DisplayName: Abyssal Sword Formation
Text.Desc: Secret Formation Diagram that records the Abyssal Sword Formation. It is said to be a Formation that is deployed according to the rules of the Eight Trigram Gates, with both offensive and defensive capabilities. Very miraculous.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nAbyssal Sword Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Abyssal Sword Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: It is said to be a Formation that is deployed according to the rules of the Eight Trigram Gates, with both offensive and defensive capabilities. Very miraculous.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit10
Text.DisplayName: Wood Spirit Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Wood Spirit Formation. It is said to be a Formation capable of awakening the Qi of vitality among heaven and earth, rejuvenating all living things.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nWood Spirit Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Wood Spirit Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Formed by concentrating the essence of primordial eastern wood spirit, it is said to be a Formation capable of awakening the Qi of vitality among heaven and earth, rejuvenating all living things.

Text.Name: Esoterica_ZhenFa_Suit11
Text.DisplayName: Convergence Formation
Text.Desc: Secret chart of Formation Diagram that records the Convergence Formation. It's said that once deployed, this Formation presents the form of the Five Peaks to ward a location, rendering it indestructible.
Text.EffectDesc: Increases Max Formation Load.\nUnlocks Ancient Formation Diagram: \nConvergence Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Name: Convergence Formation
Text.ZhenShapes.0.Descript: Formation formed by the spiritual essence of the Five Peaks. It's said that once deployed, it will present the form of the Five Peaks to ward a location, rendering it indestructible.
